data.title: Rebuild the World.
data.text:
[1.25.22 UPDATE] Los Angeles Stress Test

Friendly reminder to all players that we will be conducting a stress for the opening of Los Angeles, tomorrow, Wednesday, January 26th, at 8:00 AM PT. Players that log in between 8 - 8:10 AM PT and do a paid send will be entered into a drawing where we will be giving away .2 spark to 3 lucky winners. Assuming platform stability, we will issue a 5-minute warning before proceeding with Phase 2 of the Stress Test by opening up the "Montecito Heights" neighborhood in Los Angeles. If you're looking to travel to Los Angeles, please reference the post below to find out how you can travel to LA.

---

Los Angeles Collection Reveal is here!

---

We are excited to announce to the Upland community that our next city hub to launch in the metaverse will be none other than Los Angeles, California!

Demand for property in Upland has never been higher, and new inventory is rapidly being gobbled up by our passionate community. Los Angeles provides a diverse range of property pricing and will allow for players of all levels to realistically compete for valuable metaverse land. Additionally, as we continue to expand our efforts surrounding NFLPA Legits, we are excited to kick off the construction of the LA Stadium to extend their presence to the host city of the upcoming football championship.

Perhaps our most requested location to date, Los Angeles is the perfect next step in our continuous expansion efforts to keep up with the massive growth of the Upland Community, and we can't wait to see how you guys take to one of the most iconic cities in the world.

Los Angeles Release Details:

Due to the sheer size of the city of Los Angeles, we will be splitting LA into two regions (North and South) which will be released one week apart. Everything pictured below in bright yellow will be released as a part of the âSouthâ LA wave, everything in dark yellow will be released as a part of the âNorthâ LA wave. Additionally, we will be including the city of Inglewood (as a part of LA) in this release, pictured in green in the image below.

The Southern portion of Los Angeles is currently planned to release on Thursday, January 27th at 8:00 AM PT. â This release will be preceded by a stress test on Wednesday, January 26th, at 8:00 AM PT.

Roughly ~13% of properties in Los Angeles will be reserved under the âFair Start Actâ (FSA). As with most recent city releases, Los Angeles will be released in âVanilla modeâ. 1 week after the Southern portion of LA is released we will open the Northern half of LA. Collections will be revealed 1 week after the Northern release.

City Information

Send Fees (Lo/Hi/Default): 25/125/50 UPX

Airport: Yes

Collections: At Least 25

FSA Allocation: ~13%

Treasure Hunt Tier: 1

Fun Facts About Los Angeles

Los Angeles is the only city in North America to have hosted the Summer Olympics twice - and by 2028 the third time.

L.A. is the entertainment capital of the world, a cultural mecca boasting more than 100 museums, many of them world-class, and a paradise of idyllic weather.

Los Angeles is on the leading edge of several growth industries. The Los Angeles metropolitan area, with more than 23,000 art jobs, is the country's leading artistic center.

â

Los Angeles Terminal Sale

Starting Saturday, January 22nd, at 8:00 AM PT, players will be able to register for the upcoming sale of Los Angeles terminals taking place on Sunday, January 23rd, at 8:00 AM PT. There will be 4 batches of items for this sale, with 5-10 Airport terminals and 5 Train terminals unlocked with each batch.

Registration for Los Angeles travel terminals will only be available in the Upland Store on the web version of the Upland app.

Registration Details:

Registration Start: Saturday, January 22nd, at 8:00 AM PT

Registration Close: Sunday, January 23rd, at 8:00 AM PT

Batch 1 Sale Start: Sunday, January 23rd, at 9:00 AM PT

Batch 2 Sale Start: Sunday, January 23rd, at 1:00 PM PT

Batch 3 Sale Start: Sunday, January 23rd, at 5:00 PM PT

Batch 4 Sale Start: Sunday, January 23rd, at 9:00 PM PT

Airport Terminal Qty: 30

Train Terminal Qty: 20

Train Terminal Pricing: $475

Airport Terminal Pricing: $1920

Getting to Los Angeles

Note: Travel routes to Los Angeles will have boosted capacity for a few days prior to and during the release.

Los Angeles Release Schedule

Wednesday (1/26)

8:00 AM PT: Phase 1 of the Send Stress Test begins in all of Upland

5-minute warning before beginning the neighborhood Stress Test in LA

Phase 2: Stress Test continues in the âMontecito Heightsâ neighborhood in Los Angeles

Thursday (1/27)

8:00 AM PT: Phase 1 of the Los Angeles release will begin by opening the âMount Washingtonâ neighborhood in the Southern portion of LA

5-minute warning before beginning Phase 2 of the Stress Test

Phase 2: The âHarbor Cityâ and âFairfaxâ neighborhoods in the Southern portion of LA will open for minting

5-minute warning before the full release of LA

Phase 3: Assuming platform stability, we will proceed with releasing all remaining properties in the Southern portion of LA

â

Don't miss out on your chance to snag yourself a property in the City of Angels, where you can leave a mark on what will no doubt become an important hub in the Upland metaverse!
